sentences: The corridors were humming Friday as talks entered the substantive phase of the critical ministerial segment of COP-6 Part II.
Participants have been discussing proceedings from the main negotiating group for Ministers held behind closed doors throughout Friday.
The general feeling seems to be that the Co- Chairs' text presents the options very clearly, although they also demonstrate significant differences between Parties on many issues.
The verdict at the end of the first day of substantive talks was cautiously optimistic, with observers noting what appeared to be an important compromise involving sinks.
The prevailing mood was that a 'partial outcome' was a strong prospect, with agreement in Bonn on some key issues, but with some matters left to be resolved in Marrakech.
enb_long_title: SIXTH CONFERENCE OF THE PARTIES TO THE UN FRAMEWORK CONVENTION ON CLIMATE CHANGE RESUMED SESSION
